name: PXBlueColors
description: PX Blue colors for Eaton applications

scripts.publish:colors: cd ui && npm version patch && npm publish && cd .. && exit 0
scripts.publish:colors-branding: cd branding && npm version patch && npm publish && cd .. && exit 0
scripts.publish:all: npm run publish:colors && npm run publish:colors-branding && exit 0

author: px-blue <pxblue@eaton.com>
